summary.para: Called when a lattice element within a context changes.

param.name: pRange
param.para: Pointer to an object that represents the range of text that changed.

param.name: pLattice
param.para: Pointer to an object that represents the new lattice element.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Called when the text within a context changes.

param.name: pRange
param.para: Pointer to an object that represents the range of text that has changed.

param.name: pchText
param.para: Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the new text for the range.

param.name: cch
param.para: Specifies the number of characters contained in pchText.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfFnAdviseText interface is implemented by a text service and used by the TSF manager to supply notifications when the text or lattice element in a context changes.
The manager obtains this interface from the text service by calling the text service interface with IID_ITfFnAdviseText.
